response.summary: Civil Engineer. Specialist in Traﬀic, Design and Road Safety. Transportation Consultant and Reviewer of Infrastructure Projects.  Knowledge and experience about Business Cases for decisions making in both private and public sector. Wide experience leading and developing assessment of traﬀic impact, infrastructure and urban projects.

profile_positions.title: Human Behavior Office

profile_positions.description:
Advisor of the Transportation Area of Infrastructure and Sustainable Transportation Direction.  

Key topics:
- BIM Implementation Strategy
- Work for taxes
- Type project of rural roads
- Departamental  (Secundary) Roads
1. Giving support of preparing and reviewing documents that are presented to President, Ministeries, National entities, Directors, and international and National organizations. 
2. Doing the fellowship  of activities and technical reviewing of policies, plans, programs and investment projects in transportation Sector. 
3. Participation in Posterior Control of investment projects in charge of the Division. 
4. Giving technical support of defining, reviewing, following and execution of transportation projects developed with Nation resources, royalties, "public works for taxes", that requires viability, prioritization and approval of National Planning Department. 
5. Giving the support to the Infrastructure and Sustainable Development Direction in the participation of Director's Board, National Committees, Regulation Councils, Intersectorial Committes and others. 
6. Being part of advise and evaluation committees that are developed in contract's process by the Direction and Division. 
7. According with the contract object, attendance of national and international trips that are required.
profile_positions.title: Advisor Transportation Division

profile_positions.description:
1. Giving answers to requests submitted by control entities 
2. Giving the support of elaborating and reviewing of technical documents in road safety and traffic behavior. 
3. Doing the inspection at site visiting the projects. 
4. Giving the support to create the design and formulate researching projects of road safety. 
5. Giving the support to create road safety indicators. 
6. Being part of  georreference analysis of road safety sinister. 
7. Give the support of strategies, evaluations, analysis, plans and programs of road safety. 
8. Participate actively in activities, campaigns and strategies with the Division leadership. 
9. Giving the support of technical structuring and evaluation of different contracts process leaded by the Direction. 
10. Technical reviewing of transportation infrastructure projects.

profile_positions.description:
Transportation Advisor in infrastructure and urban planning projects. I have been part of consultant in interdisciplinary work teams as a consultant and as a coordinator in many cases.

In another hand, I have long experience using microsimulation software as Vissim and others skills with geographical software as ArcGIS.
